Text.Language: The prophecies of the First Hour of Tuesday of Holy Pascha. May its blessings be with us. Amen.
نبوات الساعة الاولى، من يوم الثلاثاء من البصخة المقدسة بركته علينا. آمين.
N~h~r/i de qen piabot m~mah somt n~te p~jini~ e~bol n~nens/ri m~p~Icra/l e~bol qen p~kahi n~,/mi: qen pie~hoou e~tem~mau: aui~ eh~r/i e~p~safe n~Cina:
Now in the third month after the children of Israel departed from the land of Egypt, on the same day, they came into the Sinai Desert.
وفى الشهر الثالث لخروج بنى اسرائيل من أرض مصر فى ذلك اليوم جاءوا إلى برية سيناء.
Ouoh aufai e~bol qen Ravazin: ouoh aui~e~h~r/i e~p~safe n~Cina ouoh auouwnh m~mau m~pem~yo m~pitwou:
For they departed from Rephidim, came into the Sinai Desert, and camped in the desert. So Israel camped there before the mountain.
ورحلوا من رافازين ووصلوا إلى برية سيناء ونزلوا هناك قبالة الجبل.
Ouoh afi~ n~je Mwuc/c e~h~r/i e~jen pitwou n~te Vnou]: ouoh afmou] e~rof n~je Vnou] e~bol qen pitwou efjw m~moc:
Then Moses went up to the mountain of God, and God called to him from the mountain, saying,
فصعد موسى إلى جبل الله فناداه الله من الجبل قائلاً:
Je nai ne n/e~teknajotou m~p~/i n~Iakwb: ouoh eke~tame nens/ri m~p~Icra/l ekjw m~moc e~rwou:
"Thus you shall say to the house of Jacob and tell the children of Israel:
هذا ما تقوله لبيت يعقوب وتخبر بنى اسرائيل قائلاً لهم.
Je n~ywten a~teten nau e~hwb niben e~taiaitou n~niremn~,/mi: ouoh ai[iy/nou m~v~r/] hijen hantenh n~te hana~qwm: aiceky/nou haroi.
'You have seen what I did to the Egyptians, and how I bore you on eagles' wings and brought you to Myself.
قد رأيتم كل الأعمال التى صنعتها بالمصريين وكيف حملتكم كأنكم على أجنحة النسور وأتيت بكم إلي
Ouoh ]nou e~swp qen oucwtem n~tetencwtem n~catac~m/: n~te tena~reh e~tadia~y/k/: e~retene~swpi n/i n~oulaoc efyou/t sae~neh e~bol oute nieynoc t/rou:
Now therefore, if you will indeed obey My voice and keep My covenant, you shall be a special people to Me above all nations; for all the earth is Mine.
والآن إن كنتم سمعاً تسمعون لصوتى وتحفظون عهدى. فأنكم تكونون لى شعباً مجتمعاً إلى الأبد من بين جميع الأمم. لأن لى الأرض بأسرها
vwi gar pe p~kahi t/rf: n~ywten de e~retene~swpi n/i n~oumetouro e~couab: nem oueynoc eftoub/out: nai ne nicaji eteknajotou m~p~/i m~p~Icra/l.
You shall be to Me a royal priesthood and a holy nation.' These are the words you shall speak to the children of Israel."
وأنتم تكونون لى مملكة مقدسة وأمة مطهرة. هذا هو الكلام الذى تقوله لبيت اسرائيل.
Afi~ de n~je Mwu~c/c afmou] e~nip~recbuteroc n~te pilaoc: ouoh af,w qatotou nnaicaji t/rou: nai e~tafouahcahni m~mwou nwou n~je Vnou].
So Moses came and called for the elders of the people, and laid before them all these words the Lord commanded him.
فجاء موسى ودعا شيوخ الشعب وقص عليهم كل هذه الكلمات التى أمره الله بها.
Afe~rouw~ n~je pilaoc t/rf eucop pejwou: je hwb niben e~tafjotou n~je Vnou] tennaaitou: ouoh tennacoymou: ouoh a~Mwu~c/c en nicaji n~te pilaoc e~p~swi ha Vnou].
Then all the people answered with one accord and said, "Everything the Lord said we will do and hearken to." So Moses reported these words to God.
فأجاب جميع الشعب معاً وقالوا. كل ما تكلم به الله نسمعه ونعمل به. فرفع موسى كلام الشعب إلى الله.
Ke gar ]emi je pacohiou e~bolhitotf pe: ouoh tefjij ach~ros e~jen pafia~hom:
"Indeed, I know pleading is out of my reach, for His hand is heavy upon my groaning.
أنا أعلم أن توبيخي هو منه. ويده قد ثقلت على تنهدى.
Nim gar eynae~mi je ]najemf: ouoh je au]nem /i sa p~jwk:
Who then would know, that I might find Him, and might bring this matter to an end?
من الذى يعلم أنى أجده وأنهم تحابوا معى إلى التمام
Ouoh an je ]na je ouhap nahraf. Pwi efe~moh n~coh:
I would state my case before Him and fill my mouth with arguments.
ولست أستطيع أن أقول حكماً أمامه.
Eie~mi de e~ nitajro n~n/e~tefnajotou n/i: eie~er ecyanecye e~n/e~tefnatamoi e~rwou.
Would that I knew the words He would answer me and could understand what He would tell me.
فيمتلئ فمي توبيخاً. أنا أعلم بثبات ما يقوله لي وأشعر بما يعرفنى أياه.
Ouoh je an f~nai e~h~r/i e~jwi qen ounis] n~jom: e~tefnaer,racye n/i an qenoum~bon:
Though He would come on me in His great strength, He would not use the occasion to threaten me.
ولا يأتى على بقوة عظيمة ولا يفسح لي فى الرجز.
}meym/i gar nem picohi hane~bol hitotf ne: efe~i~ni de e~bol m~pahap sae~bol:
For truth and rebuke are from Him, and He would bring my judgment to an end.
لأن البر والتوبيخ هما منه. ويخرج حكمي إلى الإنقضاء
Eie~sen/i de sa nihoua~]: ouoh n~nasop an je: oude ]e~mi e~rof qen niqaeu.
"Though I should proceed to this important end until I no longer exist, still what would I know about the last things?
وأمضى إلى الأوائل. ولا أكون بعد. ولا أعلم ما فى الأواخر.
Afyamio n~hanja[/ ouoh m~piamoni: efe~hwbc n~hanoui~nam ouoh n~nanau: f~cwoun gar h/d/ n~yof m~pamwit:
When He worked on the left hand, I could not understand it. His right hand will encompass me, but I will not see it.
خلق الشمال ولم أمسك ما يستر اليمين ولا أنظر.
Aferdiakrinin gar mmoi m~v~r/] m~pinoub:
For He knows my way already, and He has weighed me as gold.
هو عارف طريقى ومحصنى مثل الذهب.
Eie~mosi de n~q~r/iqen nefhonhen ouoh n~na,au n~cwi: Nefcaji eie~,opou qenkent: icje n~yof af]hap m~pair/].
I will go forth in His commandments; for I have kept His ways and will not turn aside. I will not disregard His commandments; but I have hidden His words in my bosom.
فأسلك بحسب أوامره ولا أرفضها أخفى كلامه فى حضنى.
Nim pe v/eynaeran]legin naf: v/ gar e~tafouasf: vai pe e~tafaif.
"If He too has thus judged, who is he that has opposed Him? Whatever He has willed, that He has done.
فأن كان قد حكم هكذا فمن هو الذى يقاومه. وهو ما يريده يفعله
Eybe vai aii/c m~moi e~h~r/i e~jwf: efe~]c~bw de n/i aierho] qatefh/: e~h~r/i e~jen vai.
Therefore I pursue Him zealously, and when I was instructed, I thought of Him.
من أجل ذلك أسرعت إليه أدبنى فخفت منه.
Eie~i/c qath/ m~pefho eie~comc ouoh e~nousp e~bol m~mof.
Therefore let me be serious before His face. I will consider and be afraid of Him.
لهذا أسرع قدام وجهه وأتأمل فأرتعب منه.
P[oic de afen ouswe~jen pah/t: ouoh pipantokratwr afi/c n~cwi:
For the Lord softened my heart, and the Almighty has alarmed me.
لأن الرب قد أضعف قلبى. والضابط الكل أسرع ورائى.
Naie~mi gar pe je f~nai~ e~h~r/i e~jwi n~je ou,aki: ougnovoc de pe e~tafhwbc e~bol qat~h/ m~paho.
For I did not know darkness would come upon me, but thick darkness covered my face.
لأنى كنت أعلم أن الظلمة ستأتى على. والضباب غطى وجهى.
Eybe ou de auhwp e~P[oic n~je hanounwoui~:
"Why have the times escaped the Lord's notice?
كيف خفيت هذه الساعات عن الرب.
Nia~ceb/c de auercabol n~nouyws e~auhwlem n~ouohi nem pefmane~cwou:
"Why have the ungodly stepped over the boundary, snatching away the flock with the shepherd?
فتجاوز المنافقون حدودهم مختطفين القطيع مع راعيه.
Oue~w~ de n~te hanorvanoc auolf: Ouoh ]e~he n~te ou,/ra auolc nauouw~.
They have led away the donkey of the orphans and have taken the widow's ox as a pledge.
وأخذوا حمار الأيتام وإرتهنوا بقرة الأرملة.
Auy~re hanatjom riki e~bolha v~mwit n~te ]meym/i: au,opou de eucop n~je niremraus n~te p~kahi:
They have turned aside the weak from the right way; the gentle of the land have hidden themselves together.
وجلعوا الضعفاء يميلون عن طريق الحق وإختفى ودعاء الأرض معاً.
Auswpi de m~v~r/] n~hane~heu qen t~koi e~aucet toup~raxic e~bolhijwi auhloj naf n~je ouwik n~te hana~lwoui~.
They departed like donkeys in the field. Contrary to me, they went forth to their own pursuits. Their bread was sweet to their little ones.
وصاروا كالبقر فى الحقل. وطرحوا أعمالهم على وإستحلوا خبز الأطفال.
Ouiohi m~vwou an pe auocqf m~pate tefhw] swp: hanatjom de auerhwb e~hanma n~a~loli n~te nia~ceb/c n~atbe,e ouoh n~ayouwm:
For they harvested a field that was not their own before the time, and the weak worked the vineyard of the ungodly without pay or food.
حقلاً ليس لهم حصدوه قبل أوانه. يعمل الضعفاء فى كروم المنافقين بلا أجرة ولا طعام.
Oum/s eub/s auy~rouenkot n~ath~bwc auw~li n~t~hebcw n~te tou'u,/:
They caused many naked to sleep without clothing, and they took away the covering of their life.
كثيراً ما جعلوهم يبيتون عراة بغير لباس ونزعوا كساء أنفسهم.
Cehwrp de qen niteltili n~te nitwou: eybe je m~mon tou c~kep/ m~mau aujolou noupetra:
They are wet with the showers of the mountains and have huddled around the rock for want of shelter.
فأبتلوا من قطر الجبال. وحيث أن لا خيام لهم أستتروا بالصخور.
Auhwlem de n~ouorvanoc e~bolqen noumno]: v/ de e~tafhei auyebiof:
They have snatched the orphan from the breast and have humiliated the banished.
خطفوا الأيتام عن ثديهم. ومن سقط أذلوه.
Auy~re hanouon de enkot eub/s qen nou[in~jonc: n/de ethoker auw~li mpouwik qen hanma euj/ou
They have unjustly caused them to sleep without clothing, and they have taken away the morsel from the hungry.
بظلمهم جعلوا قوماً ينامون عراة. وأخذوا خبز الجياع.
Aujwrj qen ou[in~jonc: v~mwit de n~te ]meym/i mpoucouwnf:
They have wrongfully laid snares in narrow places and have not known the way of righteousness.
فى المواضع الضيقة أصطادوا بالظلم. وطريق العدل لم يعرفوه.
N/ de e~nauhioui~ mmwou e~bol qen noubaki nem nouio~u m~poucouw~nou. t~'u,/ de n~te hankouji n~a~lwoui~ acer hannis] m~fia~hom:
They have cast the weak out of the city and their own houses, and the soul of the infants sighed greatly. Why then has He not visited them?
والذين طردوهم من مدنهم وبيوتهم لم يعرفوهم. فصارت نفس الأطفال فى تنهد شديد. لماذا لم يفتقد هؤلاء
Nyof de eybeou m~pefjem p~sini n~nai eusop hijen pikahi: ouoh m~poue~mi v~mwit de n~te ]meym/i: m~poucouwnf oude mpoumosi qen necmitwoui:
"They are ones on the earth who do not know the Lord, and they do not understand the way of righteousness, nor do they walk in His paths.
وهم على الأرض وهم لم يعرفوا طريق البر. ولم يمشوا فى سبله.
E~tafe~mi de n~nouh~b/oui~ aft/itou e~p~,aki: ouoh qen pie~jwrh efe~er m~vr/] n~ouref[ioui~:
But He knows their works and delivered them into darkness; and one shall be like a thief in the night.
فلما علم بأعمالهم أسلمهم للظلمة وفي الليل يصير مثل اللص،
Vbal n~ounwik efa~reh e~ou,aki efjw m~moc je m~mon bal nau e~roi: ouoh af,at n~ouman~,wp n~te ouho.
For the eye of the adulterer watches for the darkness, saying, 'No eye will perceive me'; and he puts a covering on his face.
وعين الزاني تراقب الظلام قائلاً: لا تبصرنى عين. فيجعل ستراً على وجهه.
Afhisatc e~han/i qen pi,aki: qen pie~hoou auhitebc e~rwou m~min m~mwou: ouoh m~poucouen v~ouwini je hanatooui~:
In the dark he breaks into houses; in the daytime they seal themselves up; they do not know the light.
نقب بيوتاً فى الظلام وفى النهار أغلقوا على أنفسهم. فلا يعرفون النور صباحاً.
Ouq/ibi n~te v~mou eynaswpi nwou eucop: je efe~couen hans~yorter n~te t~q/ibi m~v~mou:
For in due time, the shadow of death will be the same to them, because they shall know the troubles of the shadow of death.
لأن ظل الموت يدركهم معاً. لأنه يعرف أهوال ظل الموت.
f~a~ciw~ou hijen p~ho n~oumwou: efe~swpi efc~houort n~je poumeroc hijen p~kahi.
"He is swift on the face of the waters; may his portion be cursed on earth.
خفيف هو على وجه الماء. فليكن نصيبهم ملعوناً على الأرض.
Eue~ouwnh de e~bol n~je n/etr/t n~twou eusouw~ou hijen p~kahi: euhwlem gar n~han,nau n~te hanorvanoc:
May their plants wither on earth, for they have taken away from the orphans even the smallest portions.
وليظهر نباتهم يابساً على وجه الأرض. لأنهم نهبوا أعمار الأيتام.
Ita afervmeui~ m~pefnobi: afswpi de n~ayouwnh m~v~r/] n~ounif n~te ouiw]: eue]sebiw~ naf nn/e~tafaitou: efe~qomqem de n~je ref[in~jonc niben m~vr/] n~ouse n~atsau:
Then his sin is recalled to memory, and he vanishes like a mist of dew; but what he has done, may it be recompensed to him, and may every wrongdoer be crushed like rotten wood.
وحين ذكر خطيته وصار غير ظاهر كمثل الخشب غير النافع.
Oua[r/n gar m~pouerpeynanef nac: Ouoh ouatc~himi m~pounai naf.
For he has not treated the barren woman well, and showed no mercy to the feeble woman.
لأنهم لم يحسنوا إلى العاقر ولم يرحموا (الأرملة).
Qen oujwnt gar aurwqt n~hanatjom: afsantwnf gar oun m~peny~ref tenhet pefwnq:
"In his anger, he overturns the weak; therefore when he rises up, no one believes his own life is safe.
وبغضب طرحوا الضعفاء. فاذا قام لا يأمن على حياته.
Afsanswni de m~peny~ref erhelpic je f~nalojf: alla efe~hei qen ouswni:
When he falls sick, let him not hope to recover, but let him perish by disease.
وإذا مرض لا يجعلوه يرجو أن يشفى بل يسقط بالمرض.
oum/s de afyebiw~ou n~je pef[ici: aflwm de n~je ou,~lo/ qen oukauma ie m~v~r/] n~ouqemc e~af hei mmauatf e~bol qen hanrwoui~.
For his exaltation mistreated many, but he has withered as mallows in the heat, or as an ear of corn falling on its own from the stalk.
إن كثيرين خفضهم إرتفاعه فذبلت خضرتهم بالحر مثل السنبل إذا سقط وحده من البرائب.
Icje m~mon nim pe e~tafjoc naf je aij~e meynouj: euoh n~tef,w n~nacaji je hanh~li af ne.
"If it is not so, who says I speak falsely and will make my speech worth nothing?"
وإلا فمن قال له أنى كذبت ويجعل كلامى كلا شئ.
Cwtem e~p~caji m~P[oic nens/ri m~p~Icra/l: je pihap m~P[oic oube n/etsop hijen p~kahi: je ou/i m~mon meym/i: oude m~mon nai: oude m~mon couen nou] hijen p~kahi:
Hear the word of the Lord, you children of Israel, for the Lord has a judgment for the inhabitants of the land: "There is no truth or mercy or knowledge of God in the land.
إسمعوا كلام الرب يا بنى اسرائيل فأن للرب محاكمة مع سكان الأرض لأنه لا حق ولا رحمة ولا معرفة الله على الأرض.
Oucahoui~ nem oumeynouj nem ouqwteb: nem ou[ioui~ nem oumetnwik auvwne~bol hijen p~kahi: ouoh hanc~nof cemoujt m~mwou e~jen hanc~nof.
Cursing and lying, murder and theft and adultery gushed forth in the land, and blood is mingled with blood.
بل لعنة وكذب وقتل وسرقة وفسق قد فاضت على الأرض ودماء تختلط بدماء.
Eybe vai efe~erh/bi n~je p~kahi nem ouon niben etsop n~q/tf: ouoh efe~erkouji nem niy/rion n~te t~koi: nem ni[atfi n~te p~kahi: nem nihala] n~te t~ve: ouoh niketebt n~te v~iom eue~mounk:

Therefore the land shall mourn and be diminished with all the things that dwell in it: the wild beasts of the field, the reptiles of the earth, and the birds of the sky, and the fish of the sea shall come to an end;
لذلك تنوح الأرض وكل من يسكن فيها. يذبل مع وحوش البرية ودبابات الأرض وطيور السماء وسمك البحر أيضاً يفنى
Hopwc n~neh~li [ihap oude n~nefcohi: pilaoc aferantilegin naf n~oumetsamse i~dwlon: m~v~r/t m~piou/b eferan tilegin naf n~oumetsamse nou]:
That neither may anyone judge, nor analyze another; But my people are as a priest who is spoken against.
حتى لا يكون من يحاكم ولا من يوبخ، مثل الشعب الذى يمارى فى عبادة الأصنام. مثل الكاهن الذى يمارى فى عبادة الإله.
Ouoh efe~swk m~pie~hoou ouoh efe~swki m~pip~rov/t/c nemak. tekmau aitenywnc e~pie~jwrh:
"Thus you shall be weak by day, and the prophet shall be weak with you; I have compared your mother to the night.
فيتعثر بالنهار ويتعثر أيضاً النبي معك. وأمك شبهتها بالليل.
Palaoc afer m~v~r/] m~v/e~te m~mon tefcwoun m~mau: je n~yok ak,w m~p~cwoun n~cwk: a~nok hw ]na,ak n~cwi e~s~tem erou/b n/i:
My people are like as those who have no knowledge. Because you have rejected knowledge, I will also reject you from being a priest to Me;
وصار شعبى كمن لا معرفة له. لأنك أنت رفضت المعرفة. أنا أيضاً أرفضك فلا تكهن لى.
Ouoh on ]naerp~wbs m~vnomoc m~p~Icra/l ouoh ]naerp~wbs n~nouh~b/oui~:
And because you have forgotten the law of your God, I also will forget your children.
أنسى أنا أيضاً ناموس اسرائيل وأنسى أعمالهم.
Pair/] auernobi: pouw~ou ]na,af eusws:
According to their multitude, so they sinned against Me; I will turn their glory into dishonor.
هكذا أخطأوا فأبدل مجدهم هوانا.
Ninobi n~te palaoc auouomou: ouoh n~q~r/i qen nou[in~jonc cew~li n~nou'u,/.
They will eat the sins of My people and take away their lives because of their wrongdoings.
وخطايا شعبى تأكلهم. وبظلمهم تنزع نفوسهم.

Title.Language: Homily of Abba Shenouda the Archimandrite
عظة لابينا القديس أنبا شنودة رئيس المتوحدين

Text.Language: <wb c~nau n/e~]najotou: ouon niben e~taurasi e~jwou qen t~ve eybe toumeta~noia~ hijen p~kahi: cenanau an e~lup/ oude m~kah qen pima e~te m~mau:
Let me inform you about two matters. Those for whom the heavens rejoiced because they repented their sin on earth will not suffer sadness or pain in the place they are destined to inherit.
أنا أخبركم بأمرين. أن كل الذين فرح بهم فى السماء لأجل توبتهم على الأرض. سوف لا يرون حزنا ولا ألماً فى ذلك المكان

N/de e~te m~pourasi e~jwou qen t~ve eybe p~jin tacyo n~toumeta~noia~ hijen p~kahi: cenanau an e~rasi oude a~napaucic qen pima e~tem~mau: e~re nai gar naer pourasi hijen p~kahi: n~cenanau an e~rasi oude a~napaucic icjen ]nou.
As for those whom heavens did not rejoice for because they did not atone their sins and did not repent their iniquities on earth they will find neither joy nor comfort in that place.
وأما الذين لم يفرح بهم فى السماء لأجل الإرتداد من توبتهم على الأرض فسوف لا يرون فرحاً ولا نياحا فى ذلك الموضع.
N~tetencwtem an je w~ounia~tou n~n/e~terh/bi je n~ywou petouna]ho e~rwou: oude nike,wouni eynaer pourasi an hijen p~kahi: n~cenaaitou on qen niv/oui.
Because those who revel in pleasures and delights will enjoy neither happiness nor comfort in heavens.
لأن الذين سيصنعون فرحهم على الأرض. سوف لا يرون فرحاً ولا نياحا من الآن.
